Blinken urges Israel to maximize "every possible means" to boost aid to GazaU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken urged Israel on Tuesday to maximize "every possible means" to get humanitarian assistance into Gaza, saying the current situation in the densely populated enclave was unacceptable and unsustainable. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 15:37:35 GMT A3PI3BDHURMPZKRGKLNEHCCR3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/blinking-urges-israel-to-maximize-every-possible-means-boost-aid-gaza-2024-03-05/Reuters世界中东地区
Hungary president signs Sweden's NATO membership ratificationHungary's President Tamas Sulyok has signed the bill that approved Sweden's accession to the NATO military alliance, the president's office said on Tuesday. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 15:14:43 GMT STGPET7VF5LDPJZRP7XYOXGJNU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungary-president-signs-sweden-nato-membership-ratification-2024-03-05/Reuters世界欧洲
US and Jordan air-drop more aid to GazaThe United States and Jordan carried out a new air drop of humanitarian aid to Gaza's Palestinians on Tuesday, parachuting in more than 36,800 meals, the U.S. military said. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 14:55:14 GMT QE5RET3BD5LYNAADZJV7PNADV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-jordan-air-drop-more-aid-to-gaza-2024-03-05/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali世界中东地区
Russia says it strengthens military forces in Europe in response to NATORussia has strengthened its military forces in the north and west of the country to counter what Moscow perceives as a build-up of NATO forces near Russia, Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu said on Tuesday. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 14:47:19 GMT UACIKE65ZVO3XD26MQU3LENPLU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-it-strengthens-military-forces-europe-nato-response-2024-03-05/Reuters世界欧洲
Azerbaijan demolishes former Karabakh Armenian parliament buildingAzerbaijani state television broadcast footage on Tuesday showing mechanical diggers destroying the building that once housed the breakaway ethnic Armenian parliament of Nagorno-Karabakh. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 14:18:05 GMT BEE5HRMA3PPWYL7F3BEWMI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/azerbaijan-demolishes-forms-karabakh-armenian-parliament-building-2024-03-05/Reuters世界亚太地区
King Charles will miss Commonwealth Day serviceBritain's King Charles will miss next week's engagements to mark Commonwealth Day, Buckingham Palace said on Tuesday, with his wife Queen Camilla stepping in for the monarch as he continues to undergo treatment for cancer. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 14:09:58 GMT NEWPCQUSKVPNXLMM4CETFZUKTQ https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/king-charles-to-miss-commonwealth-day-service-2024-03-05/Michael Holden世界英国
Lithuania can count on Poland's military help if needed, Duda saysPoland stands ready to defend its NATO partners at any time, President Andrzej Duda said on Tuesday, as he observed part of the alliance's biggest exercises since the Cold War. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 13:51:40 GMT MK6PGQWTFZMFHO6GSL7XM6YJZY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/lithuania-can-count-poland-military-help-if-needed-doubt-says-2024-03-05/Reuters世界欧洲
Moldova spy chief warns on new destabilisation attempts by RussiaMoldova's spy chief said on Tuesday that Russia was planning fresh attempts to meddle in the country's internal affairs by provoking protests, interfering in upcoming presidential elections, and disrupting plans to join the European Union. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 13:23:42 GMT FFTLIMSUPPLYMMXPI2GCHWBY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldova-spy-chief-warns-new-destabilization-attempts-by-Russia-2024-03-05/Reuters世界欧洲
ICC issues arrest warrants for Russian commanders Kobylash and SokolovThe International Criminal Court (ICC) has issued arrest warrants for top Russian commanders Sergei Kobylash and Viktor Sokolov over alleged war crimes in Ukraine, it said in a statement on Tuesday. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 13:20:58 GMT 3CSLO2SCYZKE7LKLXR5WQR57QA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/icc-issues-arrest-warrants-against-top- Russian-commanders-kobylash-sokolov-2024-03-05/Stephanie Van Den Berg世界欧洲
Russia says it is considering putting a nuclear power plant on the moon with ChinaRussia and China are considering putting a nuclear power plant on the moon from 2033-35, Yuri Borisov, the head of Russia's space agency Roscosmos said on Tuesday, something he said could one day allow lunar settlements to be built. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 12:28:07 GMT XYQQ2OEXJKMBDDOC52UTALXFI https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/Russia-china-are-considering-putting-nuclear-power-unit-moon-ria-2024-03-05/Reuters技术空间
In Haiti, gang violence renders thousands homelessRaging violence in Haiti triggered by a top gang leader's push to overthrow the prime minister has forced more than 15,000 people to flee their homes, many of which have been destroyed, accentuating the country's sense of misery and lawlessness. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 12:02:44 GMT HYIB4WQMUVNJHMD4MLWM4QMVCA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/haiti-gang-violence-renders-thousands-homeless-2024-03-05/Steven Aristil世界美洲
